column4: funny funny, so how does Secure SHell help me connect empathy with with this chat room?
you don't use empathy, you use a command line client such as irssi or weechat
you would need to sudo apt-get install irssi (or weechat), then you could run it, it isn't installed by default
you ssh into your remote system and run irssi, then /server irc.freenode.net and then /join #ubuntu and you're back here (screen is also useful)
